name: Turtwig

evolution.description: Turtwig can evolve into Grotle at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tiny Leaf Pokémon. Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Shell Armor
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to extra damage dealt by a Critical Hit.
